posts.title: Looking for wordpress plugin
posts.content: I look for a wordpress plugin that allows user to create a listing with their bio and social media links on my site for a fee. It should also have some shortcode so I can include a section in the home page where every listing would appear. Do you know of a plugin that does that?)

posts.title: Joomla Templates
